name: Advanced Exit Popup
author: wphostpk

sections.description:
Advanced Exit Popup is a free WordPress plugin developed by https://wphost.pk that allows you to display custom code like HTML5 / CSS3, Facebook like box, Shortcodes, etc when user intent to exit your website on desktop or mobile.

Advanced Exit Popup automatically detects the mouse behaviors on desktop and scroll behaviour on mobile to show a pop up window which indicates your visitors are about to leave your site.

Plugin Features

  • Click on close icon image or out of popup window to hide/remove popup
  • Unlimited colors for title and body content popup
  • WordPress shortcode can be used in popup content
  • Control the Height and Width of your Popup window

Up coming version will have many more options.

To keep yourself updated you can do one or all of the following. It will also encourage us to keep it updated and add more features.

  • Like our Facebook page
  • Follow us at Twitter
  • Follow us at Google+

Found a bug or have a feature request ?
Report here or have any question contact us at dev@wphost.pk.
sections.installation:
1. Upload advanced-exit-popup.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the “Adv Exit Popup” section page.
  4. Fill in all fields.
    That’s all!
